transcript: the gift taken relationships I think I am naturally on a scale from one to ten one being a taker and ten being a giver I'm naturally a ten and tens get run all over ones don't get opportunities because they're always just trying to take and people just get tired of them the vast majority of people are tit for tatters so you give I give just like the fives and I think that what happened over my career is that I shifted from a 10 to like an eight they've actually done a lot of game theory research on this and found that like 8 out of ten is the proper amount of give take for optimal outcome you just have to know when it is your turn to take
